name: Flipsy Shapes
description:
PLEASE NOTE: Make sure you first click the game above so it has keyboard focus.

Presenting Flipsy Shapes our Ludum Dare 35 entry. A feast of fast paced shape matching goodness.

Work through all the levels then test your high score in Arcade Mode or kick back and bliss out in Zen Mode.

Made from scratch in a day and a half.

Credits

  • Concept: Kiran
  • Programming: Tim
  • Title Screen: Amanda
  • Game Testing: Nathan, Kiran, Amanda, Tim
  • Sound made with BFXR
  • Special thanks to Persimmon Pomelo for keeping our spirits high!

Check out our Ludum Dare entry page here - http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=91454.
